mapper.select: SELECT GROUPSEQ ,GROUPNAME FROM T_PUSH_USER_GROUP_INFO WHERE ISDELETED = 'N'

SELECT A.CUID, A.CNAME FROM T_PUSH_USER_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PUSH_USER_GROUP B ON A.CUID = B.CUID
B.GROUPSEQ = #{GROUPSEQ}
AND A.CNAME LIKE CONCAT(#{CNAME}, '%')
GROUP BY A.CUID, A.CNAME ORDER BY A.CUID

SELECT A.CUID, A.CNAME FROM T_PUSH_USER_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PUSH_USER_GROUP B ON A.CUID = B.CUID
A.CUID NOT IN (SELECT CUID FROM T_PUSH_USER_GROUP WHERE GROUPSEQ = #{GROUPSEQ})
AND A.CNAME LIKE CONCAT(#{CNAME}, '%')
GROUP BY A.CUID, A.CNAME ORDER BY A.CUID

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_PUSH_USER_INFO A INNER JOIN T_PUSH_USER_GROUP B ON A.CUID = B.CUID AND B.GROUPSEQ = #{GROUPSEQ}
AND A.CNAME LIKE CONCAT(#{CNAME}, '%')

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CNT), 0) CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT , IFNULL( B.GROUPSEQ, 1 ) AS GRP FROM T_PUSH_USER_INFO A LEFT JOIN T_PUSH_USER_GROUP B ON A.CUID = B.CUID AND B.GROUPSEQ = #{GROUPSEQ} WHERE B.CUID IS NULL
AND A.CNAME LIKE CONCAT(#{CNAME}, '%')
GROUP BY IFNULL( B.GROUPSEQ, 1 ) ) A WHERE GRP = 1
